revised_title: The Opposite Electrification Produced by Animal and Vegetable Life: A Study on the Movement of Cells in Electric Fields
tldr: This study investigates the movement of animal and vegetable cells in electric fields, revealing that animal cells move towards the negative pole, while vegetable cells move towards the positive pole. The findings suggest that cells carry opposite charges, with animal cells being negatively electrified and vegetable cells positively electrified.
